scripts.dev-build: npm run react-native bundle -- --reset-cache --platform android --dev true --minify false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/index.android-dev.bundle --assets-dest ./build/assets
scripts.prod-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --minify true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/index.android-prod.bundle --assets-dest ./build/assets
